FairField by Marriott
3.8 Kms to the Airport, making it the perfect choice for every traveller
Treat yourself to an exceptional stay at Fairfield by Marriott Visakhapatnam. Located in the heart of the city, our hotel is near NAD Junction, beautiful beaches, famous temples, numerous shops, and 3.8 Kms to the airport, making it the perfect choice for every traveler. If a business conference, wedding or social event brings you to this hotel, you'll be delighted with its versatile venues, its rooftop pool, and custom catering.
